abstract: Lone Star Funds will recoup almost a third of its original investment in a move that drew divided reaction.
snippet: Lone Star Funds will recoup almost a third of its original investment in a move that drew divided reaction.
lead_paragraph: SEOUL, South Korea, Feb. 2 — Lone Star Funds, the United States buyout firm whose multibillion-dollar sale of its investment in Korea Exchange Bank was blocked by South Korean prosecutors, will recoup almost a third of its original investment in a move that drew divided reaction.

headline.main: Lone Star Gets Big Dividend in Korea Deal
headline.print_headline: Lone Star Gets Big Dividend in Korea Deal
